extensionDescription.message: Investigates the HTTP status of links in a webpage, selection or link.

menuSelection.message: Investigate the links in the selection

showStatsCaptionLabel.message: When finished, open a popup window with the results of the analysis. The popup is shown only when there is one of these categories detected: broken, invalid or timeout.

hideStatsAfterCaptionLabel.message: Hide statistics after a defined amount of seconds. Use 0 to disable this setting.

linksFineCaptionLabel.message: Color to highlight links that work.

linksTimeOutCaptionLabel.message: Color to highlight links that didn't return any headers for a long time

linksSkippedCaptionLabel.message: Highlight color for links that weren't analyzed

linksInvalidCaptionLabel.message: Highlight color for links that returned header, but it wasn't http/https header

secondsTimeOutCaptionLabel.message: Links that take longer than the defined threshold are being considered as timed out

donationCaptionLabel.message:
Thank you for using Link Investigator.
Your support will be a big encouragement, as I continue to develop the add-on.
If you like Link Investigator, I would be pleased if you could consider donating.

amo.message: Firefox restricts some functions on some URLs

error.message: There was an error with the operation

linksFinePopup.message: The link returned a code between 200 and 300, meaning it's ok.

linksBrokenPopup.message: The link returned code was either 404, or some of other 'can't get here'.

linksTimeOutPopup.message: The link has {secondsTimeOut} seconds to open and return header. But one didn't make it.

linksInvalidPopup.message: The link didn't return any valid header. Either is server down, or it's redirecting to protocols others than not valid.

linksSkippedPopup.message: The link wasn't tested. It can be either anchor to this page (#), or JavaScript, etc...

browserButtonTitle.message: Link Investigator - Click to check the current page
